responses.content: No reunion occurred at Seawatch/Riverwatch today. Party departed Caras for Grey Plains. ADV bullet not satisfied.
No new tracks found today. Party is travelling Caras to Grey Plains, not in East March. ADV bullet not satisfied.

6 NPCs resolved: Lithoe breakthrough (TRG fired), Lalholm witnesses breakthrough, Thordak tremor report, Conorth reads Vael evidence + fourth Deryth meeting, Joppa preparations continue, Voss patrol rotation

state_changes.text: NPAG-S8-D1: Lithoe@Khuzdukan: Counter-sequence breakthrough achieved (8/8 TRG FIRED); viable counter-sequence identified; ward failure timeline can be extended; needs Thoron's party to implement
NPAG-S8-D1: Lalholm@Khuzdukan: Witnessed Lithoe's breakthrough; theological implications of rune-chain severance being assessed; preparing for party arrival
NPAG-S8-D1: Thordak@Khuzdukan: Reports tremors unchanged in frequency; wardens holding; awaiting Thoron's return with full party

NPAG-S8-D1: Conorth@Caras: Read Vael evidence packet — customs anomaly documented; fourth meeting with Deryth (Ironmask agent); Deryth proposes Golden Hind trade route partnership; Conorth considering; does not connect evidence to Golden Hind yet
NPAG-S8-D1: Joppa@Vornost: Dragon Throne preparations continuing; honour guard drilled; letter confirmed missed at Seawatch; dispatching second courier
NPAG-S8-D1: Voss@Fort Vanguard: Rotating patrols; Thess still deployed east; garrison stable under Bale
